title: Spacious | Newly Built | House for sale @ Panadura
details:
Spacious | Newly Built | House for sale @ Panadura

Land & Floor Area -
15 perches, (2600sq,ft)

Bedrooms -

5 (Upstair 2 & Downstair 3)
Fully tiled flooring (2 x 2)
Curtain / Ceiling fans

Bathrooms -

3
Master Attached / Hot water (Geezer)
Shower cubicles

Indoor Specifications -

Large Living / Dining / Pond with kumbuk stairway
Upstair sitting with TV area open to front balconies
Show pantry area for Upstair

Outdoor Specifications -

Open sit-out area
Front & Rear Spacious garden area
Servant facilities (toilet & bath)

Kitchen / Pantry -

Show pantry with Cooker hood & Granite top part
Backyard kitchen for outside cooking purposes (with Pantry)

Special Description -

Double Bricked Walls (9 inch)
Fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas
Solid wooden interior & exterior ( 1st class timber)
Pipe born water with over head water tank
Fitted modern light fittings / High wooden ceiling
French windows / SLT line / internet / satalite TV
Calm & quiet residential area

Parking -

Car porch plus parking space for another 2 or 3 vehicles

Boundaries -

surrounded by well built walls with steel gate & 2 wicket gates

Access road -

20 Feet wide (concrete road)
Very closed proximity to Panadura city limit (1km)
1km to Panadura Horana main Rd

Key places -

2km to LYCIUM International School
2.5km to LEEDS International School
1.5km to Sumangala Boys School

23.5 million , 235 Laks (Negotiable)
